translation.zh: 欢迎 年轻的创业者们

translation.en: They say there are no shortcuts in life.

translation.en: is the closest thing to free you'll ever get.

translation.en: so get out there and sell.
You ask a lot of questions.
[woman 1] My friend is having some strange reaction right now.
[man 1] This is what I'm telling you, man, he lifted the freaking car over his head.
translation.zh: 这就是我要告诉你的 他把那辆该死的车举过了头顶

translation.en: [man 2] I don't know how to describe this, but I just seen some weird shit.

translation.en: [man 3] Look, I don't see no blood at all. No blood.

translation.en: ♪ I bet you I could spit for hours ♪

translation.en: ♪ But I'm pretty as a flower ♪
♪ Shower, dropping heavy bars Up off a tower ♪

translation.en: ♪ My people call me Dwight Howard ♪
translation.zh: 我的人叫我魔兽霍华德

translation.en: ♪ I'm that kid This Black kid, no cowards ♪

translation.en: ♪ Spit it so they get it ♪
We shouldn't even be here right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在不应该来这里

translation.en: -Come on, bird! -[man 2] You're not even listening.
translation.zh: -出来啊 小鸟！ -你根本没在听我说话

translation.en: [woman] Say, bro, let me see your hands.
translation.zh: 喂 兄弟 把手露出来

translation.en: [woman] Supply and demand. You want it or not?

translation.en: You take it, for five minutes, you get what you get.

translation.en: Instead of selling it to us, why don't you just give it to us?
translation.zh: 不要卖了 直接给我们好了？

translation.en: -[woman screams] Don't touch me! Get off! -[man 3] Take that stupid mask off!
translation.zh: -别碰我！放开！ -把那个愚蠢的面具脱掉！

translation.en: Get off me! Give me my bag!
-Stop! How many has she got? -Just three.
-But I bet this chick has more. -[motorcycle revving]

translation.en: Gentlemen, on your knees, hands behind your head.
translation.zh: 先生们 跪下 手放在脑后

translation.en: I see we have a lady here, as well. You too, ma'am.
translation.zh: 我看见这里还有一位女士 女士 你也要照做
手 非常好 谢谢

translation.en: You sure you want to do that, young man?
translation.zh: 你确定你想那么做吗 年轻人？

translation.en: You ever taken one of those before?
You haven't, have you? I can tell.
translation.zh: 你没吃过吧？我看得出来

translation.en: Now, I bet you've heard it can make you fast, make you strong.
translation.zh: 那么我打赌你听说过 它能让你变快变强

translation.en: Make this a fair fight, even though I got a gun pointed at your face.
translation.zh: 哪怕我用枪指着你的脸 你也能和我公平对决

translation.en: But that's only if you happen to have a good Power.
translation.zh: 但只有好的超能力才能那样

translation.en: Some people take it and just blow up.
translation.zh: 一些人吃了药就爆炸了

translation.en: -I don't wanna do this anymore, man. -Shut up.
So the question is, what's your power?
translation.zh: 所以问题是 你的超能力是什么样的？

translation.en: Might be good, might be bad, nobody knows.
translation.zh: 可能是好的 可能是坏的 没人知道

translation.en: You boys are lucky I only have one pair of cuffs.
translation.zh: 你们这帮小鬼真幸运 我只有一副手铐
本来我要把你们都抓了

translation.en: That is not what I saw.
So what, you practice that in the mirror?
translation.zh: 那又怎样 刚才那招你是对着镜子练的？

translation.en: I bet you had your gun out too.
translation.zh: 我猜你在镜子前把枪也拿出来了

translation.en: Pointed at yourself, talking all hard like you Clint Eastwood.
translation.zh: 指着自己 像克林特·伊斯特伍德那样说些狠话

translation.en: [man] What do you know about Clint Eastwood? [woman] I know enough.
translation.zh: -你对伊斯特伍德了解多少？ -足够多了

translation.en: -[woman] The Bridges of Madison County. -That's actually a pretty good one.
translation.zh: -《廊桥遗梦》 -那真的是一部好片子

translation.en: [woman] By the way, it's 500 for that pill in your pocket.
translation.zh: 话说 你口袋里的那颗药值500块

translation.en: The same stuff as last time?
-Yeah, what else it gonna be? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -对 还能是什么？ -我不知道

translation.en: Did you get it from the same guy as last time?
translation.zh: 你还是从同一个人那里拿的货？

translation.en: Come on, you either gonna be a cop or a customer.

translation.en: to take out whole precincts of cops single-handed.
translation.zh: 能单枪匹马干掉一个辖区的警察

translation.en: I'm just trying to level the playing field.
translation.zh: 我就是想让竞争更公平一点

translation.en: -What do you think of the bike? -It's an all right bike.
translation.zh: -你觉得这辆摩托车怎么样？ -这是辆很好的车

translation.en: Well, you want it or not?
-I mean, I brought it here for you. -You lying.
translation.zh: -我特意骑过来打算给你的 -你骗人

translation.en: No, you said it was your birthday the other day, right?
translation.zh: 没有啊 某天你说是你生日的 对吧？

translation.en: -That was a month ago. -Okay then, you know what? Never mind.
translation.zh: -那是一个月前的事了 -好吧 你知道吗？算了

translation.en: -No, I mean, I want the bike. -Yeah, you sure?
translation.zh: -不 我是说 我想要这辆车 -嗯 你确定吗？

translation.en: -Why the seat made out of duct tape? -It was nicest one at the impound lot.
translation.zh: -为什么座椅是用胶带做的？ -这是扣留的车里最好的一辆了

translation.en: ♪ I mean, please Don't you cowards know? ♪
I have a caller on the line. Tell me exactly what you saw.
translation.zh: 有位听众打进了电话 告诉我你到底看到了什么

translation.en: [man] Man, I saw a kid running down Poydras last night, 35 miles per hour.
translation.zh: 昨晚我看到一个小鬼 在波德拉斯街上跑 时速有60公里

translation.en: [DJ] Did you have a speed gun on this guy?
translation.zh: 怎么 你拿测速枪测过这小子吗？

translation.en: [man] Man, if the speed limit is 25, he passed it down cold.
translation.zh: 如果限速是40公里 他已经超速了

translation.en: I'm telling you, he was on something.

translation.en: [DJ] Bruh, it sounds like you might have been on something.
translation.zh: 兄弟 听起来你自己吃了药

translation.en: [man] Wayne, you can make fun all you want, but I'm telling you, something going on.
translation.zh: 韦恩 你想怎么取笑就怎么取笑 但我告诉你 有事情正在发生

translation.en: There's videos. I saw one the other day,
translation.zh: 有视频为证 那天我看到一个孩子

translation.en: a kid jumped straight off the roof of the casino and just walked away.
translation.zh: 从一家赌场的楼顶跳了下来 然后就走掉了

translation.en: [DJ] Maybe there's a little conspiracy going--
[Newt] I ain't ask who you're looking for, I said, "Who is it?"
translation.zh: 我不是问你找谁 我问“你是谁？”

translation.en: I understand that, sir. I'm a friend of Simon's.
translation.zh: 我理解 先生 我是赛门的朋友

translation.en: He sent me here to talk to you. Maybe you wanna do some business.
translation.zh: 他叫我来和你谈谈 也许你想做个生意

translation.en: [Newt] Come where I can see you.
translation.zh: 走到我能看到的地方来

translation.en: I got a box in my hands.
You wanna see my hands, or put the box down?

translation.en: Put the box down and get your hands up.
translation.zh: 把盒子放下 再把手举起来

translation.en: -Okay, I'm with you. Box down. -[Newt] Yeah, just...
translation.zh: -好的 我听你的 盒子放下 -对 就是…
现在 慢慢地 要非常慢
对 慢 一切都很慢

translation.en: If you want, you can call Simon. He'll verify who I am.
translation.zh: 你愿意的话可以打给赛门 他可以证实我的身份

translation.en: Tell him that the Major's here to see you.
I'ma go make that call. You stay right there.

换做是我就不会那么做

translation.en: Just need some information, that's all.

translation.en: Tell me where you're getting this stuff, and I'll get out of here.

translation.en: All you gotta do is tell me who your supplier is.

translation.en: So what you think about that, Newt, huh? We got a deal?

translation.en: you can slither back to whatever hole that you came out of, understand?

[woman] Newt, you gonna get somebody killed in here!

translation.en: Where you getting this shit from? Who's making it? Tell me the source!

translation.en: [man] Tell me right now! Who's the supplier?

没事 宝贝 我马上就出来

translation.en: -I'ma go pick some up later. -[TV chattering]
The initial investigation is indicating a home meth lab,

translation.en: but we're gonna wait until we see the full report

translation.en: Isn't that where Newt hangs out?

translation.en: Uh, I'm not sure, could be.
Text your cousin for me, baby.

translation.en: with your prescription and your soup tonight.

被称为胎儿酒精综合症

现在我们聊聊如何避免

translation.en: How do we prevent these birth defects?

不要嗑药 不要饮酒

translation.en: Simple. It is the only form known as FAS...

translation.en: I know that you don't think this stuff is serious,

translation.en: you don't think it's important, but it is.

translation.en: Right now, you're getting a D in this class, Robin.

translation.en: So since you don't seem to be worried about your grades or graduating...

translation.en: you must have a plan, right?

translation.en: Make me believe that you've got a shot,
and I'll give you a C for the year.
♪ Now what's the difference Between a student and a teacher? ♪

去给自己买双运动鞋吧

translation.en: ♪ Get new kicks, get a clue, get a hint ♪

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, I see I'm digging at your pride ♪

translation.en: ♪ It don't love nobody like me ♪
♪ Diplomas won't determine Who I am or who I might be ♪

translation.en: ♪ So next time you tempted to pick on me For a laugh ♪
♪ Skip theatrics and just tell me I can get up out your class, bitch ♪
translation.zh: 少装模作样 直接告诉我 我可以离开你的课堂 贱人

translation.en: You can give me that phone
or you can go to the office.
Let's get back to prevention, please.

translation.en: There is no magic pill to fix it.

translation.en: [man on radio] Reports of armed robbery downtown near the Savings bank.
translation.zh: 报告市区储蓄银行附近出现武装劫匪

translation.en: Sir, what'd you see in there?
translation.zh: 先生 里面是什么情况？

translation.en: I don't know, I didn't see him.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我没看见他
他不知道从哪里冒出来

translation.en: It's like I was hit by a ghost.
[man] This is not right, man, you gotta...
You can't just get-- Not now, Landry. Not now.

translation.en: You can't just come and take my shit over.
translation.zh: 你不能就这么直接过来 接管我的工作

translation.en: Armed robber, multiple hostages, the negotiator can't make contact.
translation.zh: 武装劫匪 多名人质 谈判专家无法和里面取得联系

translation.en: Pretty sure our scene just became theirs.
translation.zh: 很明显他们接管了现场

translation.en: You weren't down here ten minutes ago. What is this? What do we do?
translation.zh: 你们十分钟前才到的 这算什么？我们做了什么吗？

translation.en: This is wrong. I'm gonna remember that. I'm gonna remember that.
translation.zh: 这是不对的 我会记住这件事的

translation.en: We've been asked to stand down.
We're here in support now only.
Frank, this is some bullshit, man.

translation.en: Like, if it was up to me...
The bags! The bags! Follow the bags!
[man on radio] All units set up a perimeter.

translation.zh: 目标为男性 可能是白种人

translation.en: [Frank] Hey! Hey! Out of the way! Out of the way!
Get out of the way! Go! Go!

translation.zh: 喂！新奥尔良警察！ 你听见没有？
有没有人看见一个隐身…
新奥尔良警察 你被逮捕了！

translation.en: [woman] Scale of one to ten, ten being the worst, what's your pain right now?
translation.zh: 1到10 10是最痛 你现在的疼痛指数多少？

translation.en: -It doesn't hurt. -[woman] Any soreness in here?
-For a second, I did there. -[bells chime]
translation.zh: 在现场有那么一小会儿

translation.en: Look at my finger. Follow it.
translation.zh: 看我的手指头 眼神跟着

translation.en: Can you excuse us for a minute?

translation.en: Did you take a pill today?
Put your gun and the badge on the table.
translation.zh: 把你的配枪和警徽放在桌子上

translation.en: Gun and badge on the table, now.
translation.zh: 配枪和警徽马上放到桌子上

translation.en: If I hadn't taken that, I'd be dead.
translation.zh: 如果不吃药 我就死了

translation.en: -That what you want? -I want my police force to obey the law!
translation.zh: -那是你想要的吗？ -我要我的警员守法！

translation.en: There are no laws on this drug!
They don't exist officially, 'cause every time we try to deal with it,
translation.zh: 正式来讲它们并不存在 每次我们想要处理这个问题

translation.en: some guys in suits show up and tell us to stop.
translation.zh: 就会有穿西装的人出现 叫我们停止

translation.en: Look, I don't know who those two were that came in today
translation.zh: 听我说 我不知道今天到现场 让你停止行动的那两个人是谁

translation.en: and cut you off at the knees.
translation.zh: 让你停止行动的那两个人是谁

translation.en: I don't know if they're feds or military or what,
translation.zh: 我不知道他们是不是 联邦调查局还是军队的人

translation.en: but clearly, they have you under their thumb.
translation.zh: 但显然他们控制住了你

translation.en: And I don't think you like it.
'Cause they don't care about the people of this city.
translation.zh: 因为他们不在乎这座城市的人民

translation.en: Not like you do, not like I do,
and we know what happened last time we were counting on guys in suits
translation.zh: 我们都知道上一次 我们靠那些穿西装的人

translation.en: to look out for New Orleans.
translation.zh: 保护新奥尔良结果是怎么样的

translation.en: Now, you need to make me the bad guy, that's fine.
translation.zh: 现在你需要把我当成坏人 没关系

translation.en: But I'd be willing to bet you know more than you're allowed to say.
translation.zh: 但我愿意打赌 你知道更多的事 但是不能说

translation.en: Maybe we can work together on this, unofficially.
translation.zh: 也许这件事我们可以合作 私底下

translation.en: And maybe we can do some good.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以做一些好事

translation.en: [man on radio] Captain, suspect is currently being removed from the premises.
translation.zh: 队长 他们正在把嫌犯转移出现场

translation.en: [Captain] Anybody finds you with that, you didn't get it from me.
translation.zh: 要是别人发现这个 不是我给你的

translation.en: I'm told he's the source of Power.
translation.zh: 别人告诉我他是超能药的源头

translation.en: We shut him down, we get our city back.
translation.zh: 摧毁他的生意 就能让我们的城市恢复正常

translation.en: -You need anything else? -[man] No, I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你还需要什么？ -不要了 我很好
没错 你的确很好看

translation.en: So, can I get you anything?
-I'll take some of that. -Yeah. Okay, I'll get that for you.
translation.zh: -我要一些 -有的 我去给你拿

translation.en: Can I get some hot water?
Say, you saw who did this?
No, I just came out the door.
translation.zh: 没看见 我刚走出来

translation.en: [Robin's voice] It's Robin. You know what to do.
translation.zh: 我是罗宾 你知道该怎么做

translation.en: I need to re-up, so meet me in the usual spot.
translation.zh: 超能药我要补个货 我们老地方见吧

translation.en: [Robin] Let me out! Please, let me out!
translation.zh: 放我出去 求你了 放我出去

translation.en: You keep kicking around in there.
translation.zh: 你一直在里面踢个不停

translation.en: This how we gonna do this.
All that kicking ain't making no sense.
translation.zh: 你这么踢根本没有意义

translation.en: You in a strange man's car in an even stranger place.
translation.zh: 你在一个陌生的地方 被关在一个陌生人的车里

translation.en: But I need to have a conversation with you.
-I need to be able to look-- -[Robin screams] I need to be able to look you in your eye.
maybe I need to make a trip over to 32 Park, right?
translation.zh: 也许我该去一趟公园街32号 对吗？
你知道公园街32号在哪里吗？

translation.en: Well, if I let you out and you start crying,
translation.zh: 如果我放你出来 你大叫

translation.en: I'ma pay a little visit to Irene.
translation.zh: 我就得去拜访一下艾琳了

translation.en: Make sure she all right, huh?
I take it you love Irene 'cause you ain't knocking no more.
translation.zh: 我想你很爱艾琳 因为你不踢了

translation.en: So when I open this up,
translation.zh: 所以我要把后备箱打开

translation.en: [man] Why don't we start from the beginning, make it simple?
translation.zh: 我们不如简单一点 从头开始吧？

translation.en: -Huh? -I'm Robin! Oh, I can't hear you.
translation.zh: -我叫罗宾 -哦 我听不见你说话

translation.en: You push that Power, don't you?
translation.zh: 你卖那种超能药 是不是？

translation.en: I don't know nothing about that--
Maybe you'll figure it out, huh? You stay in there until you figure it out.
translation.zh: 也许你会想起来 对吧？ 你想在里面待到想起来为止吗？

translation.en: -Maybe you know something about Newt. -I don't-- I don't know--
translation.zh: -也许你知道纽特的事 -我不知道

translation.en: -Oh, you don't know who Newt is? -No.
[man] That's funny because Newt be all in your phone.
translation.zh: 真有意思 因为你的手机里全是纽特的信息

translation.en: I get weird texts from people all the time because that's what the job is.
translation.zh: 我一直收到奇怪的短信 因为这份工作就是这样的

translation.en: Well, let me tell you what's even more weird.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你什么事情更加奇怪

translation.en: So since Newt ain't here, that leads us to... where to, huh?
translation.zh: 所以既然纽特不在了 那么我们要去…哪里呢？

translation.en: Where to, Robin? I need to know where the source is.
translation.zh: 去哪里 罗宾？ 我需要知道货源在哪里

translation.en: So you can advance your position in life.
translation.zh: 这样你才能提升你的地位

translation.en: -Hmm? Look closer, is that Biggie? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -凑近看 这是大个吗？ -我不知道

translation.en: Oh, you on these streets, you don't know shit.
translation.zh: 你在街头混 却不知道

translation.en: I know you're feeling like fight or flight,
translation.zh: 我知道你在考虑打还是逃

translation.en: but I'ma tell you right now, you just breathe and get through it
translation.zh: 但你只要深呼吸 挺过去

translation.en: because listen, you don't know who I am and what I'm about,
translation.zh: 因为听好了 你不知道我是谁 我要干什么

translation.en: but I got to find that source.
translation.zh: 但我必须要找到药的货源

translation.en: I need to get to the top of the food chain.
translation.zh: 我要站到这个食物链的顶端

translation.en: But you keep messing around with me and acting like you don't know shit,
translation.zh: 但如果你一直跟我打岔 装作一无所知的话

translation.en: I'm gonna knock your ass out, and then I'm gonna go kill your mother.
translation.zh: 我会把你狠揍一顿 然后把你母亲杀了

translation.en: She's connected to every cartel in South America.
translation.zh: 她和南美的所有贩毒集团都有联系

translation.en: Then our backers will see what the rest of us have already seen.
translation.zh: 然后 我们的支持者 就会看到我们其他人已经看到的东西

translation.en: That we're working for the woman who's gonna change the world.
translation.zh: 我们在为一个将改变世界的女人工作

translation.en: Welcome. I see you packed light.
translation.zh: 欢迎 我看到你轻装前来

translation.en: if the product lives up to its reputation.
translation.zh: 如果这种产品和它的名声相符

translation.en: It is not just a product.
You're about to become the most powerful woman in South America.
translation.zh: 你将成为南美最有权势的女性

translation.en: In that case, I look forward to your demonstration.
translation.zh: 这样的话 我很期待看你的展示

translation.en: Hey, I see what you doin'.
translation.zh: 嘿 我看见你在干吗了

translation.en: You do what I told you.
I was told to call this number if I ever had a problem.
translation.zh: 有人告诉我如果遇到麻烦 就打这个电话

translation.en: [man] Go to Hong Kong Market off of Patterson.
translation.zh: 去帕特森路尽头的香港超市

translation.en: Go to the back and ask for alligator wine.
translation.zh: 走到最后面 就说买鳄鱼酒

translation.en: [man] You're gonna go meet whoever's in there,
you're gonna tell them what we talked about.
You're gonna tell them that you saw me and that I left.
translation.zh: 你告诉他们你看见我了 然后我走了

translation.en: No, you said point you in a direction, that's a direction.
translation.zh: 不 你说给你指路 那就是路线

translation.en: You ever hear of a mine rat?
-It sound like a rat that get blown up. -Well, that's what you are.
translation.zh: -听起来像是会被炸死的老鼠 -那就是你

translation.en: Look, I was just trying to make ends meet. I'm just a kid, I'm--
translation.zh: 听着 我只是想维持生计 我还是个孩子 我…

translation.en: I know what you trying to do!
You out here in these streets dealing, you ain't no damn kid.
translation.zh: 你在街头做生意 你他妈的不是孩子了

translation.en: You can't keep playing that whole "I'm just a child" card, okay?
translation.zh: 你不能老是拿 “我还是个孩子”当挡箭牌 好吗？

translation.en: Excuse me, could you help me out with this?
translation.zh: 打搅 能帮我个忙吗？

translation.en: -Is it spicy, is it mild? -I don't know what the fuck it is.
translation.zh: -这是辣的还是不辣的？ -我不知道这他妈是什么东西

translation.en: Okay, why don't you have a seat?
Yeah, he gave it to me in case something went wrong.
translation.zh: 对 他把号码给我 以防任何意外出现

translation.en: Then he threw me in his trunk.
translation.zh: 然后他把我扔进车子后备箱

translation.en: This is the safest place for you right now.
translation.zh: 现在对你来说 这里是最安全的地方

translation.en: Biggie works in sales. This is distribution.
translation.zh: 大个负责销售 这里是配送中心

translation.en: I don't want to talk to any middle men. Already did that.
translation.zh: 我不想和中间人谈 我已经谈过了

translation.en: You don't tell me where Biggie is, I'll cut your fucking head off.
translation.zh: 你不告诉我大个在哪里 我就把你的喉咙割断

translation.en: Don't worry, okay? I'm gonna come--
It's so good to see you.
They're logging Powers. There's chips in every capsule.
translation.zh: 他们在追踪超能药 每个胶囊里都有芯片

translation.en: The government won't let them test it, so they test it on us.
translation.zh: 政府不让他们测试 所以他们就在我们身上测试

translation.en: The people that you're selling to,
[man] It's a demonstration for potential buyers.
translation.zh: 这是为潜在买家准备的展示会

translation.en: It means they're done with New Orleans. It means I'm running out of time.
translation.zh: 意味着他们已经放弃新奥尔良了 意味着我没时间了

translation.en: He ODed. I didn't kill him.
translation.zh: 他自己服药过量 我没有杀他

translation.en: I'm just trying-- I'm just trying to find my daughter.
Yo, you need to calm down.
You fell out, I brought you to the vet. My mom work here.
translation.zh: 你昏过去了 我带你来兽医站 我妈在这里工作

translation.en: But now I need to finish the exit wound.
translation.zh: 但现在我需要缝合那个射出口

translation.en: You gonna let me do it or not?
I didn't even do nothing yet.
[woman] There a lot of girls that look just like her!
[man] Mrs. Reilly, do you want your daughter to end up dead?
translation.zh: 莱利女士 你想让你女儿最后丧命吗？

translation.en: I already told you, I don't know where she is.
translation.zh: 我已经告诉过你了 我不知道她在哪里

translation.en: She was supposed to be home hours ago. What...
translation.zh: 她几小时前就应该回家了 怎么…

translation.en: With all due respect, officer, there's a lot of girls--
translation.zh: 恕我直言 警官 有很多女孩…

translation.en: [man] This could get very ugly for your daughter
-and for you. -[woman] Are you sure it was her?
translation.zh: -都不会有好结果 -你确定是她？

translation.en: Are you sure you're not mistaken?
[man] Are you sure you haven't seen this man before?
translation.zh: 你确定你之前没见过这个男的？

translation.en: [woman] No, I told you I don't know what you talking about.
translation.zh: 不知道 我告诉过你 我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: We have surveillance footage of your daughter with this man tonight
translation.zh: 监控录像显示今晚你女儿和这个男人

translation.en: committing crimes about five miles from here.
translation.zh: 在八公里以外的地方进行犯罪活动

translation.en: This could get a whole lot uglier for you.
translation.zh: 对你来说可能会更难堪

translation.en: Honey, bear. Are we all out of that one hippie shampoo that--
translation.zh: 宝贝 熊熊 我们的嬉皮士洗发水都用完了…

translation.en: Whoa! What the shit's going on here? Who the hell are you guys?
translation.zh: 他妈什么情况？你们到底是谁？

translation.en: What you doing in my bathroom?
-[man] We're the police. Who are you? -Man, I live here.
translation.zh: -我们是警察 你是谁？ -我住在这里

translation.en: Babe, I'm sorry I was in your shower. The pressure's so much better in yours.
translation.zh: 宝贝 抱歉我在你这里洗了个澡 你这里水压更大

translation.en: I'm really sorry it had to happen that way.
translation.zh: 真的抱歉事情变成这样

translation.en: Let me just handle these guys, okay?
translation.zh: 我来搞定这些人 好吗？

translation.en: What precinct did you guys say you're from?
translation.zh: 你刚才说你们来自哪个辖区？

translation.en: Sir, Mrs. Reilly and her daughter
translation.zh: 先生 这个地址登记的住户

translation.en: seem to be the only residents registered to this address.
translation.zh: 似乎只有莱利夫人和她的女儿

translation.en: So now because I'm not in your little database, I can't...
translation.zh: 所以因为我不在 你们那个小数据库里 我不能…

translation.en: I thought you said you lived here.
translation.zh: 我记得你说你住在这里

translation.en: Is that so hard to believe? Why?
translation.zh: 就这么难相信吗？为什么？

translation.en: Are you assuming that me and this beautiful Black woman
translation.zh: 你们就以为我和这位美丽的黑人女子

translation.en: wouldn't be able to share a happy home?
translation.zh: 不能共享一个幸福的家吗？

translation.en: You wanna say that on camera?
translation.zh: 你们想要在镜头前说吗？
-宝贝 你的电话在哪里？ -给你

translation.en: All right. Well, let's just see about this.
-And we are live streaming. -[phone beeps] Now, let's just get this on record.
translation.zh: 我们开始直播了 现在 让我们公开记录下这个情况

translation.en: Honey, did either of these men show you a warrant
translation.zh: 宝贝 他们进我们家的时候

translation.en: when they came into our house?
Uh-huh. And did either of them show you a badge?
No! Can I see your badges?
Thank you for your time, Mrs. Reilly.
translation.zh: 谢谢你抽出时间 莱利夫人

translation.en: [woman] I'm sorry, do I know you?
My name is Detective Frank Shaver, NOPD.
translation.zh: 我是弗兰克·谢弗警探 新奥尔良警局的

translation.en: Well, I don't have it on me.
Mrs. Reilly, your daughter and I have had a professional friendship
translation.zh: 莱利女士 你女儿和我是工作上的朋友

translation.en: for a little over half a year now.
She's a very smart and good-hearted young person,
translation.zh: 她是非常聪明 心地善良的年轻人

translation.en: but she is mixed up in some things she shouldn't be,
translation.zh: 但她卷进了不该卷进的事情

translation.en: and I am trying to help her.
Thank you. I'm gonna need this too.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我还需要这个
那么你的超能力是什么？

translation.en: Come on. You ain't tried it?
translation.zh: 少来了 你就没试过？
我看过一位姑娘服药过量

translation.en: they're talking about how it'll give you superpowers,
translation.zh: 大家都在聊这种药怎么让你有超能力

translation.en: but not about how one hit could kill you.
translation.zh: 但却没提可能会让你丧命

translation.en: why you still in the game?
What happened to getting good grades and staying in school?
translation.zh: 为什么不考个好成绩 待在学校里呢？

translation.en: Yo, I wish I could get good grades.
translation.zh: 喂 我希望我能有好成绩

translation.en: Go to school, get to college, get some fancy-ass job.
translation.zh: 去上学 去上大学 找一份好工作

translation.en: Well, my mother has diabetes now.
translation.zh: 我妈妈现在患了糖尿病

translation.en: And we don't got no health insurance.
And she needs surgery, the expensive kind, so what else am I supposed to do?
translation.zh: 她需要手术 贵的那种 所以我还能怎么做呢？

translation.en: -What, it don't trip you up killing fools? -Yeah, it tripped me up.
translation.zh: -怎么 杀那些蠢蛋不会把你搞疯？ -对 的确把我搞疯了

translation.en: But that was my skill set.
And what did the system do? It took advantage of me.
translation.zh: 这个制度做了什么？它利用了我

translation.en: But I know now I got to work the system harder than it's working me.
translation.zh: 但现在我知道 我应该钻系统的空子 而不是让它钻我的空子

translation.en: You're young, you're Black, you're a woman.
translation.zh: 你还年轻 你是黑人 你是女人

translation.en: The system is designed to swallow you whole.
translation.zh: 这个制度本身的目的 就是要将你生吞活剥

translation.en: You gotta find out what you do better than anybody else and rock that.
translation.zh: 你得找出你比别人强的地方 然后在这方面下苦工

translation.en: So what you gonna do? Hmm?
How you gonna leave your mark?
I'm sorry. Well, what's your rap name then, huh?
translation.zh: 对不起 你的说唱艺名是什么？

translation.en: What you gonna be, the next Cardi B?
translation.zh: 你会成为下一个卡迪·B吗？

translation.en: Well, go ahead and spit then.
You say you rap, let me hear one line.
translation.zh: 你说你会说唱 让我听一句

translation.en: Huh? You can't spit one line?
I don't like doing it in front of people.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢在别人面前唱

translation.en: How you gonna to be a rapper if you got stage fright?
translation.zh: 如果你有舞台恐惧症 怎么当说唱歌手呢？

translation.en: You know what I think? Most time, people don't wanna do something
translation.zh: 你知道我是怎么想的吗？ 通常人们不想做某事

translation.en: is 'cause they're probably just wack at it.
If you wack, just say you wack.
translation.zh: 如果你不擅长 就说自己不擅长

translation.en: Give you a word? What you talking about?
translation.zh: 给你一个词？你在说什么？

translation.en: [Robin] I'm gonna go off the top, give me a word.
translation.zh: 我会即兴来一段 给我一个词
哦 你有那么厉害啊？

translation.en: ♪ And every single accolade for spitting 'Bout to be mine ♪
translation.zh: 每一句的荣耀都将是我的

translation.en: ♪ I'ma go from old shit and goodwill To design ♪
translation.zh: 我要从慈善店淘旧货到亲自去设计

translation.en: ♪ I'ma be rocking Dior like Dion I'm Celine ♪
translation.zh: 我要撼动迪奥 就像迪翁那样 我就是茜琳

translation.en: ♪ Can someone tell them other boys A real MC is coming, no humming ♪
translation.zh: 有没有人能昭告天下 真正的饶舌歌手来了 不来虚的

translation.en: ♪ My name already chose a different bird ♪
translation.zh: 我已经用了另一种鸟的名字

translation.en: ♪ I killed your lil freestyle Give me another word ♪
translation.zh: 我来一段自由说唱就干掉你了 再给我一个词

translation.en: ♪ Dude trying to trip me up With his seismograph ♪
translation.zh: 这家伙想用他的地震仪把我逼疯

translation.en: ♪ I think it's funny I can't pick a better time to laugh ♪
translation.zh: 我觉得这很好笑 我找不出更好的时间来哈哈大笑

translation.en: ♪ You don't know all the rhymes I have ♪
translation.zh: 我的韵脚多到你无法想象

translation.en: ♪ The only thing that don't sit well Within this mind ♪
♪ I might need an anti-psychotic I'm going crazy ♪
translation.zh: 我可能需要抗精神病药 我要疯了

translation.en: ♪ NOLA made me And this flow, I got it ♪
translation.zh: 新奥尔良把我变成这样 这个状况 我明白

translation.en: ♪ I been about it Even if my mental space is crowded ♪
translation.zh: 我一直在想 哪怕我的精神世界也拥挤不堪

translation.en: ♪ I keep it in because a guilty dog Gonna bark the loudest ♪
translation.zh: 我把它关在里面 因为内疚的狗叫得最响

translation.en: ♪ My mom's the proudest I know that we can make it out if ♪
translation.zh: 我妈妈是最自豪的 我知道我们能成功 如果

translation.en: ♪ We made it through a flood I bet we gonna get through the drought ♪
translation.zh: 我们挺过了洪水 我打赌我们也能挺过干旱

translation.en: ♪ I may be little, but in these waters you won't catch me drowning ♪
translation.zh: 我的个头也许很小 但我绝不会溺水

translation.en: ♪ One day I'll swim in all them Dollar bills I'ma be counting ♪
translation.zh: 总有一天我会在美钞里游泳 边游边数钞票

translation.en: You take that, you leverage that,
you use your power to take the system down.
translation.zh: 你用你的超能力扳倒这个制度

translation.en: You gotta take four of them.
Yeah, well, you a big dog.
♪ 'Bout to make a million For all my, all my, all my ♪
He took something from me. I gotta get it back.
translation.zh: 他拿走了我的东西 我要拿回来
听着 别得寸进尺了

translation.en: I could navigate for you. You're going to where the dots on the screen is.
translation.zh: 我可以帮你导航 你要去屏幕上这些点的位置

translation.en: Why the hell would I pay you $10,000 for anything?
translation.zh: 为什么我要付你一万块？

translation.en: Medical expenses, keeping your ass alive, kidnapping fee.
translation.zh: 医药费 让你活命的费用 绑架的费用

translation.en: I'd say I done you a lot of solids here.
translation.zh: 我可是帮了你很大的忙了

translation.en: So, this is your daughter, Tracy.
And you think that guy with the beard took her?
translation.zh: 你觉得那个长胡子的抓走了她？

translation.en: They were the ones who cracked the codes back in the day.
translation.zh: 当时就是他们破解了遗传密码
抓了一些游骑兵过去 都关进一个屋子里

translation.en: put 'em all in the room, filled them up with radiation.
translation.zh: 抓了一些游骑兵过去 都关进一个屋子里 让他们接受辐射

translation.en: Tried to turn us into superheroes.
translation.zh: 想把我们变成超级英雄
他们为什么想制造超级英雄？
他们不想 并非如此

translation.en: 'Cause in the real world, the power goes to where it always goes,
translation.zh: 因为在现实世界 超能力总是会流向

translation.en: to the people that already have it.
translation.zh: 已经拥有超能力的那些人
好吧 那么你的超能力是什么？

translation.en: Damn near killed me, hurt a lot of people.
translation.zh: 差点害死我 伤了很多人

translation.en: So I said I'm not trying that shit no more.
translation.zh: 所以我说我再也不试这破玩意儿了

translation.en: A few years later, Tracy came along.
translation.zh: 几年后 翠西出生了

translation.en: I knew she was different though.
translation.zh: 不过我知道她和别人不一样

translation.en: When she was young, she never got sick or anything like that.
As she got older, she got stronger.
translation.zh: 随着年龄增长 她变得越来越强壮

translation.en: But she never had to take a pill.
If you got, like, beaucoup shit in your system,
translation.zh: 如果你体内有很多毒素

translation.en: maybe it got passed down to her.
Oh, okay. Yeah, you hood, but you smart, huh?
translation.zh: 好吧 对 你做事粗糙 但很聪明 对吗？

translation.en: Anyway, when Teleios caught wind of Tracy,
translation.zh: 当完美真理得知翠西的消息后

translation.en: they wanted to experiment on her like they did on me.
translation.zh: 他们想要在她身上做实验 就像对我做的那样

translation.en: And that's when we just took off.
translation.zh: 然后我们就开始逃亡了

translation.en: -I got my seat belt on. -No, you don't. Put your seat belt on!
translation.zh: -我系上了 -不 你没有 系好安全带！

translation.en: -[Tracy and Robin] Nobody's following us. -Hold on.
translation.zh: 没人跟踪我们 坐稳了

translation.en: This voice, do what I tell you to do, okay?
translation.zh: 这个声音 照我说的做 好吗？

translation.en: [Robin] I mean, this is the spot.
You know what? Sometimes, the plan just walk right up on you.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？有时候 计划会找上你

translation.en: Know what I'm saying? That's what I'm trying--
Hey, man, I'm sorry, you got a light on you, man?
translation.zh: 抱歉 能借个火吗 兄弟？

translation.en: -[man] Watch it. -[Art, slurring] No, be nice.
You gonna act like that, huh?
Your girl got you feeling good? She look good, man.
translation.zh: 你的妞让你很爽吗？ 她看起来很正

translation.en: -Stuck-up guy with a gun. -With a gun.
translation.zh: -带枪的自命不凡的家伙 -带枪

translation.en: Man, they definitely ain't gonna cash no checks, you heard?
translation.zh: 他们肯定不是去兑现支票的 是吧？

translation.en: All right, that's all I need.
translation.zh: 好了 我就需要这么多

translation.en: I thought we was like Batman and Robin.
translation.zh: 我以为我们是蝙蝠侠与罗宾

translation.en: We ain't Batman and Robin, that's a movie, this is real life.
translation.zh: 我们不是蝙蝠侠与罗宾 那是电影 这是现实

translation.en: Man, I got your blood on me.
You just hang here and wait till I get back, all right?
translation.zh: 你就在这里等我回来 好吗？

translation.en: [slurring] Man, glad to be in here.
-Oh, man! What's up, man? -Can I help you?
-[man] Man, look. -[Art] It's me. Ain't you Nico?
translation.zh: -老兄 听着 -是我 你不是尼可吗？

translation.en: I ain't no Nico, this a private party.
translation.zh: 我不是尼可 这是私人派对

translation.en: No. You got the wrong spot, man.
translation.zh: 不 你走错地方了 兄弟

translation.en: No, I know I got the right spot.
[man] You're not on this list, man. It's a private party. You got to roll out.
translation.zh: 你不在名单上 这是私人派对 你得离开

translation.en: Yeah, that's my name right there.
translation.zh: 没错 上面写着我的名字呢

translation.en: Over the last months, we've been going from city to city
translation.zh: 过去几个月 我们辗转多个城市

translation.en: in a kind of a... let's call them clinical trials.
translation.zh: 进行某种…暂且称为临床试验吧

translation.en: and we move on quickly to avoid unwanted oversight.
translation.zh: 我们移动迅速以避免不必要的关注

translation.en: The next evolution of the human species.
translation.zh: 人类种族的下一次进化

translation.en: With your financing, Teleios could become the most powerful company in the world.
translation.zh: 有了你们的资金 完美真理将成为全球最强大的公司
这个计划的名称说明了一切

translation.en: Power to level the playing field.
translation.zh: 创造公平竞争环境的超能力

translation.en: Or, if you like, destroy it entirely.
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢 也可以把它彻底摧毁
重新审视你的现实的超能力

translation.en: One day, you won't even need a pill.
translation.zh: 有一天 你甚至都不需要吃药

translation.en: Sure. Let me tell you about my friend the little lizard.
translation.zh: 当然 让我讲一讲我的朋友小蜥蜴的故事吧

translation.en: A healer who can stitch himself up and even regrow what he lost.
translation.zh: 一种可以自我缝合 断肢再生的自愈生物

translation.en: Hands, feet, eyes, unfathomably complex structures.
translation.zh: 手、脚、眼、复杂到难以想象的结构

translation.en: The octopus camouflages herself against the sea floor.
translation.zh: 章鱼把自己伪装在海床上

translation.en: The wolverine frog breaks its own bones to use as weapons.
translation.zh: 金刚蛙会折断自己的骨头作为武器

translation.en: They see in the dark, they dislocate their bones.
translation.zh: 它们在夜里也能看见 它们让自己的骨头脱臼
它们把水变成等离子体

translation.en: They punch, they strangle, they thermoregulate.
translation.zh: 它们击打 它们绞杀 它们调节体温

translation.en: Evolution has given animals countless abilities we can only dream of.
translation.zh: 进化赋予了动物 无数种我们只能梦想的能力
太多的超能力 拜托

translation.en: All the genetic potential hidden in our DNA
translation.zh: 所有遗传潜能都隐藏在我们的DNA中

translation.en: one day, a pill that lasts forever.
translation.zh: 有一天 一颗药将永久有效

translation.en: But as we work to a compound that we fully control,
translation.zh: 但我们正在制造一种 可以完全控制的化合物

translation.en: Looking for you. Your mom is worried sick.
translation.zh: 找你 你妈担心坏了

translation.en: Listen, don't bullshit me right now.
translation.zh: 听着 现在别糊弄我

translation.en: Why is he a bad guy? Because he's done some bad things?
translation.zh: 为什么他是坏人 因为他做过坏事吗？

translation.en: What about you? You do bad things too!
That is almost a good point, but the bad things that I have done--
translation.zh: 几乎说到点子上了 但我做过的坏事…

translation.en: He's just looking for his daughter.
Everything he's doing, he's doing it for her.
translation.zh: 他做的每一件事都是为了他女儿

translation.en: -That sound like a bad guy to you? -That's what he told you?
translation.zh: -你觉得他是坏人吗？ -他告诉你的？

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry that you miss your dad,
translation.zh: 听着 我很遗憾你想你的爸爸

translation.en: -but he's telling you a story-- -Don't do me like that--
translation.zh: -但他在编故事给你听 -别那样对我

translation.en: He's not here looking for his daughter. He's setting up shop.
translation.zh: 他不是来找女儿的 他是来开拓生意的

translation.en: -You think he's the source of Power? -Yes!
translation.zh: -你觉得他是超能药的源头？ -是的

translation.en: Well, he's not. He's trying to stop it.
Uh-huh. Okay. If that's true, and by the way, I don't think it is,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你说的是真的 顺便说 我不这么认为

translation.en: but if it is, then he should be helping me.
translation.zh: 但如果是 那么他应该帮我

translation.en: If it's not true, then he's lying to you and he's dangerous
translation.zh: 如果不是真的 那么他在骗你 他很危险

translation.en: and I need to bring him in. Either way, you should tell me where he is.
translation.zh: 我需要逮捕他 不管怎么样 你应该告诉我他在哪里

translation.en: [man] Ladies, gentlemen, the moment you've traveled so far to see.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 你们远道而来就为了看到这一刻

translation.en: -What's gonna happen to me? -[man] Don't worry.
[whispers] They have one at the CIA.

translation.zh: 太让人兴奋了 朋友们

translation.en: You're about to witness a very rare power.
translation.zh: 你们将目睹一种罕见的超能力

translation.en: This one can get a bit intense.
translation.zh: 这次的展示可能比较激烈

translation.en: [man] Let's make sure she stays comfortable.
translation.zh: 让我们确保她的身体始终保持舒适吧

translation.en: There's people on this list I don't think should be here.
translation.zh: 名单上的一些人 我觉得不应该来这里

translation.en: [man] Esto es nada. Hay mucho más.
translation.zh: 这没什么 好戏还在后头
-你就是那个人 -接下来会这样

translation.en: You're gonna take two steps to the left. Look at me.
translation.zh: 你往左走两步 别看他们 看着我

translation.en: You're gonna walk out of that elevator, I'ma be right behind you.
translation.zh: 你要走出那部电梯 我会跟在你后面

translation.en: Please. I'm about to sell 100,000 pills.
translation.zh: 拜托 我马上就要卖出10万颗药丸了

translation.en: -Let me finish this sale. -No, we ain't got time for that.
translation.zh: -让我把这笔生意做完 -不行 我们没时间了

translation.en: -[woman] Get down! -[man] Don't come closer. Just do what he says.
translation.zh: -趴下！ -别靠近 照他的话做

translation.en: Tell him put it down. Talk to him.
translation.zh: 叫他放下枪 跟他说

translation.en: You don't, I'll make a mess of him right now.
translation.zh: 你们不照办 我要开枪了

translation.en: You can have him. We're just gonna take the pills.
translation.zh: 随你怎么处置他 我们拿走药丸就行

translation.en: [man] Fine, take the pills. We can work it out.
translation.zh: 好啊 拿走药丸 我们能解决

translation.en: Hey! Put the case down now!
[screaming] Get me out! Get me out! Get me out!
[Art, muffled] Where is she? Where's my daughter?
translation.zh: 她在哪里？我女儿在哪里？

translation.en: Whatever you want. Pills, money, anything.
translation.zh: 你想要什么都可以 药 钱 什么都行

translation.en: I don't want no frickin' pills.
Who is this, and where do I find them?
translation.zh: 这是谁 我要去哪里找他们？

translation.en: -Just... please, no need for this-- -Huh? No?
translation.zh: 拜托了 不需要这样

translation.en: I bet you know now, huh?
translation.zh: 我打赌你现在知道了 对吗？

translation.en: The whole operation's on a boat called the Genesis.
translation.zh: 所有运作 都在一艘名叫创世纪的船上进行

translation.en: Is that where my daughter is?
Is she on the boat? Tell me where my daughter is!
translation.zh: 她在船上吗？告诉我我女儿在哪里？
-新奥尔良警察 放下武器！ -哦 天哪！

translation.en: -Put the gun down, now! -I can't do that, chief.
translation.zh: -马上把枪放下！ -我做不到 警官

translation.en: All right, gun down, hands up. Boss, you running everything.
translation.zh: 好的 放下枪 举起手 老大 都是你说了算

translation.en: -Just know I got a little hitch here. -I don't care!
translation.zh: -就是我这里有个小障碍 -我不在乎！

translation.en: I understand you don't care, but I gotta care.
translation.zh: 我明白你不在乎 但我在乎

translation.en: I'm just letting you know I'm complying, okay?
translation.zh: 我就是让你知道我在配合了 好吗？

translation.en: You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can and will be used--
translation.zh: 你有权保持沉默 你说的任何话将被…

translation.en: Robin told me to tell you something.
translation.zh: 罗宾要我告诉你一些事

translation.en: She said every moment comes with invisible decisions.
translation.zh: 她说 每一刻都伴随着无形的决定

translation.en: She told me to tell you about mine rats and seismographs...
translation.zh: 她要我告诉你矿鼠和地震仪…

translation.en: Man it was long. It was about decisions,
translation.zh: 说了很长的故事 都和决定有关

translation.en: but in the end she said, "Am I lying?"
translation.zh: 但到最后她说：“我在说谎吗？”

translation.en: -[Art] What the hell are you doing here? -[Robin] I got worried.
[Art] Go, go, go! Get her out of here!
-[Robin] Frank, we gotta help him. -[Frank] You already did help him.
translation.zh: -别这样 弗兰克 我们得帮他 -你已经帮过他了

translation.en: You brought him here. Are you not paying attention?
translation.zh: 你把他带到这里来了 你没注意吗？

translation.en: At least he's being honest about it.
Come on. Art, tell him what you told me.
translation.zh: 快点 阿特 把你告诉我的跟他说一遍

translation.en: -No, come on, please, you can't give up. -I said...
translation.zh: -不 快点 拜托 你不能放弃 -我说了

translation.en: Do I look like your daddy or something?
-Down in the basement! -[Robin] You gotta help him.
translation.zh: -在下面的地下室！ -你得帮帮他

translation.en: He'll never find his daughter if you arrest him.
translation.zh: 如果你逮捕他 他就永远都找不到女儿了

translation.en: Well, you're both a bunch of cowards!
[Captain] You've reached the voicemail of Captain Craine
translation.zh: 你接通了新奥尔良警察局

translation.en: of the New Orleans Police Department. Please leave a mess--
translation.zh: 克雷队长的语音信箱 请留言…
队长 我抓到那家伙了 正在带回局里

translation.en: I'm bringing him in. Call me back.
translation.zh: 队长 我抓到那家伙了 正在带回局里 回我电话

translation.en: Uh-huh. Let me guess, you're one of the good drug dealers, right?
translation.zh: 让我猜猜 你是一名善良的毒贩 是不是？

translation.en: You're trying to save the world.
Listen, it ain't too late for you to walk away.
translation.zh: 听着 你现在离开还不算太迟

translation.en: You're the one in handcuffs, and I'm literally in the driver's seat,
translation.zh: 戴手铐的是你 开车的人可是我

translation.en: in the next 30 seconds, your captain is gonna call you
translation.zh: 接下来30秒内 你的队长会打电话给你

translation.en: and tell you to take me to a different place, not the precinct.
translation.zh: 叫你把我带去另一个地方 而不是辖区警局

translation.en: But we're never gonna make it to that place.
translation.zh: 但我们永远到不了那个地方

translation.en: And then your captain sends out a single cop
translation.zh: 然后你的队长就派了一名警察

translation.en: to apprehend the most dangerous man in the city. Why?
translation.zh: 逮捕全市最危险的人 为什么？

translation.en: Because he's taking orders from someone else.
translation.zh: 因为他要听命于其他人

translation.en: And I can also tell you that that van over there...
translation.zh: 我还能告诉你那辆面包车…

translation.en: They gonna kill you, and then they gonna take me.
translation.zh: 他们会杀了你 然后他们会把我抓走

translation.en: Now, I'm okay with that second part of this
translation.zh: 如果能让我早点找到女儿

translation.en: if it gets me to my daughter sooner.
-What are they doing here? -Doing field testing.
translation.zh: -他们在这里干什么？ -做实地试验

translation.en: If they can stabilize it, then they'll mass produce it.
translation.zh: 如果药效稳定 他们就会大规模生产

translation.en: So whatever's happening here is gonna start happening everywhere.
translation.zh: 所以这里发生的事情 到时候会在所有地方发生

translation.en: And what? Your kid has something to do with it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你女儿跟这件事有关？

translation.en: Where do you think they got the formula from?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们是从哪里得到配方的？

translation.en: They think they can just test their shit on the people of New Orleans
translation.zh: 他们以为 可以在新奥尔良人民身上做试验

translation.en: and no one's gonna care, no one's gonna fight them on it?
translation.zh: 没人会在乎 没人会反抗他们吗？

translation.en: Well, let 'em see what happens. What do you need?
translation.zh: 让他们好好见识一下吧 你需要什么？

translation.en: You still got them pills on you?
[man on radio] What happened to the cop?
[woman on radio] Get the Major to A deck.
I want all personnel and cargo loaded ASAP.
translation.zh: 我要所有人员和货物尽快上船

translation.en: What the hell are you doing here? I told you--
translation.zh: 你在这里干什么 我告诉过你…

translation.en: You scared me half to death, almost gave me a heart attack!
translation.zh: 你把我吓个半死 心脏病差点被你吓出来

translation.en: -Those men have guns-- -Don't be barking orders at me--
translation.zh: -那些人有枪 -别这么大声地指挥我

translation.en: -You not my daddy-- -We're not having this conversation.
translation.zh: -你不是我爸爸 -我们不要聊这个话题了

translation.en: No, it was his plan. It's the only way he can get to his daughter.
translation.zh: 不 这是他的计划 这是他找到女儿的唯一办法

translation.en: -Now I gotta bust in after him. -So what are we gonna do about it?
translation.zh: -现在我得进去找他了 -那么我们要怎么做？

translation.en: Put this in your ear and you tell me about what's coming and what's going.
translation.zh: 把这个放在耳朵里 告诉我最新情况

translation.en: You got a few guards with guns right in front of you.
translation.zh: 你前面有几名带枪的警卫

translation.en: I think you should do the Clint Eastwood thing.
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该用 克林特·伊斯特伍德那招

translation.en: -I'm not doing the Clint Eastwood thing. -[high-pitched whirring]
translation.zh: 我不用克林特·伊斯特伍德那招

translation.en: -I got a meeting upstairs. -[guard] Stay right there.
You know who I am, right? NOLA dock authority.
translation.zh: 你知道我是谁 对吗？ 新奥尔良港务局的

translation.en: You know I don't care, right?
translation.zh: 你知道我不在乎 对吗？

translation.en: You heard of a harbor master? That's my boss.
translation.zh: 你听说过港务局长吧？ 那是我老板

translation.en: Now, if your boss doesn't give my boss ten thousand dollars,
translation.zh: 现在 如果你的老板 不给我老板一万块

translation.en: -I guess that vessel's not going anywhere. -[Robin] He's not down, Frank.
translation.zh: 那这艘船就哪里都不去了吧 他不合作 弗兰克

translation.en: I think maybe you gotta go with the Clint Eastwood thing.
translation.zh: 也许你得用克林特·伊斯特伍德那招

translation.en: Come on, like you practiced in the mirror.
translation.zh: 快点 就像你在镜子面前练习的那样

translation.en: Well, I guess you just gotta ask yourself one question.
translation.zh: 这样的话 你就得问自己一个问题了

translation.en: Am I gonna be the guy that makes a bad decision
translation.zh: 我要不要做出错误决定

translation.en: to send the bag man home empty-handed,
make the boss get out of bed,
start raining hellfire on whoever's responsible?
translation.zh: 对着负责的人大发雷霆？

translation.en: Or am I gonna be the guy who makes a good decision
and get the hell out of the goddamn way,
so we can all get home in time to watch the Saints highlights?
translation.zh: 这样我们都能回家 赶上看圣徒队的精彩表现？

translation.en: [guard] Hey, I got an answer for you.
translation.zh: 喂 我帮你问到答案了

translation.en: [man on radio] Let's get him outta here.
[woman] I know you think what we're doing here is wrong,
translation.zh: 我知道你觉得 我们在这里做的事是错误的

translation.en: but do you know the name Henrietta Lacks?
translation.zh: 但你听过 海莉耶塔·拉克斯这个名字吗？

translation.en: Henrietta Lacks checks into a hospital in 1951
translation.zh: 海莉耶塔·拉克斯1951年住院

translation.en: to have a tumor removed from her cervix,
but the doctor doesn't just take the tumor,
translation.zh: 但医生不仅仅切除了肿瘤

translation.en: he also takes healthy cells in the process.
translation.zh: 手术过程中他还切除了健康的细胞

translation.en: [Robin] Frank. Wait, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 弗兰克 等等 你能听见我吗？

translation.en: [woman] Those cells, stolen without her consent,
translation.zh: 那些细胞 未经她的允许被窃走

translation.en: are the backbone of nearly every medical advancement in the last century.
translation.zh: 成为上个世纪 几乎所有医学进步的基石

translation.en: All because someone took one look at that woman
translation.zh: 就因为有人看了那女人一眼
翠西的实验室结果让人惊艳

translation.en: We're talking about permanent power, the next step in human evolution.
translation.zh: 我们要聊的可是永恒超能力 是人类进化的下一步

translation.en: All of our greatest advancements began in darkness, Major.
translation.zh: 我们所有伟大的进步 都始于黑暗 少校

translation.en: It's up to the pioneers to light the way.
translation.zh: 要靠先驱者来照亮道路

translation.en: [Art] Well, you see, that's the thing, Doc.
translation.zh: 好吧 但事情是这样的 博士

translation.en: How about you take your science project
translation.zh: 不如你带着你的科学项目

translation.en: -and you shove it up your mother-- -[zapping]
Salvage whatever genetic material you can and flush the rest.
translation.zh: 留下所有还能抢救的遗传物质 然后把剩下的处理掉

translation.en: No, you're supposed to be the lookout.
translation.zh: 不行 你要负责放哨
好吧 看到这里了吗？

translation.en: All the checkpoints got their own security doors.
translation.zh: 所有的检查站都有独立的安全门

translation.en: And if I press those two buttons, the whole thing go on lockdown mode.
translation.zh: 如果我按下这两个按钮 整个系统就会进入封锁模式
对 就像《廊桥遗梦》里那样

translation.en: So you're saying you can open and close doors for me.
translation.zh: 你的意思是 你可以在这里帮我控制开关门

translation.en: You get in any trouble, you run. You meet me at the front of the ship.
translation.zh: 你要是遇上麻烦就跑 我们在船头见面

translation.en: If I can get there, I will. If I can't, then you keep running.
translation.zh: 如果我能去 我会去的 如果我不能 你就继续跑

translation.en: But there's like a thousand guards out there.
translation.zh: 但外面差不多有一千个警卫

translation.en: But you know I'm awesome, right?
translation.zh: 但你知道我很厉害 是吗？

translation.en: It's about to get real noisy.
Got eyes on him right now.
[woman] Get to ops, find out why this alarm is going off.
translation.zh: 去控制室 看看警报为什么会响

translation.en: All right, where am I going now?
translation.zh: 好的 现在我该往哪里走？

translation.en: There's another door at the other end, to the left, down the stairs.
translation.zh: 另一头还有一扇门 往左 下楼梯
弗兰克 我们有麻烦了

translation.en: -That big dude's coming this way. -[Frank] Which way?
translation.zh: -那个大家伙往这边走了 -哪边？

translation.en: -How quickly can you get us out of here? -About 15 minutes until we can release
translation.zh: -最快还需要多久才能离开这里？ -距离起锚大概要

translation.en: -Down the stairs, last door to the right. -[Frank] Copy that.
translation.zh: -下楼梯 右边最后一个门 -收到

translation.en: Heading down to sub level two.
Frank, I think I found her.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 我想我找到她了

translation.en: [Robin, broken audio] Frank, I know where she is.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 我知道她在哪里了

translation.en: [Frank] You're breaking up. What'd you say you found?
translation.zh: 你的声音断断续续 你说你找到什么了？

translation.en: [Frank, broken audio] I can't hear you, Robin.
translation.zh: 你的声音断断续续 我听不见 罗宾 （创世纪号）
安全甲板 轮机甲板…

translation.en: -What did you say?You found what? -[Robin] Can you hear me?
translation.zh: -你说什么？你发现什么了？ -你能听见我吗？

translation.en: Frank, look out, there's someone behind you!
translation.zh: 弗兰克 小心 有人在你后面！

translation.en: Just get him to the door, Frank.
translation.zh: 把他弄到门那里 弗兰克

translation.en: of the most advanced tactical team in the world
Frank, punch him in the nuts or something.
[Robin] Come on, Frank. It's time to be awesome.
translation.zh: 快点 弗兰克 该展现实力了

translation.en: [woman] Wallace, what the hell is going on down there?
translation.zh: 华莱士 下面怎么回事？

translation.en: [woman] You get back to the Major.
Well, then get us out to sea.
[Art] Let me ask you something, big man.
translation.zh: 我问你点事 大个子

translation.en: What's the most powerful animal on the planet?
translation.zh: 世界上最强大的动物是什么？

translation.en: [Art] Some people think it's the lion 'cause, you know, they big,
translation.zh: 有人觉得是狮子 因为你知道 它们的体型很大
小小个 看起来人畜无害

translation.en: but hit you so fast, it vaporizes the water around it.
translation.zh: 但它击打到你的速度非常快 快到它周围的水会被蒸发

translation.en: Eight thousand degrees hotter than the surface of the sun.
translation.zh: 比太阳表面温度还要高8000度

translation.en: rips the flesh right off the bone.
translation.zh: 直接能将肉从骨头上撕下来

translation.en: it's just Mr. Shrimp sitting there, eating...
translation.zh: 只有虾先生坐在那里 吃着…

translation.en: We get all these powers from animals, right?
translation.zh: 我们的超能力都是 来自于动物 是吗？

translation.en: Hey! What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 你到底在干什么？

translation.en: Get the fuck out of here!
I was a little disappointed we took you without a fight.
translation.zh: 没打一架就抓到你了 我有点失望

translation.en: Got a lot of dead friends because of you.
translation.zh: 我有很多朋友都因为你而死

translation.en: That's disgusting, by the way. Come on.
translation.zh: 话说那好恶心 快走

translation.en: I gotta get you out of here.
I gotta bring you to him.
[woman] All right, I'm gonna check the other room.
translation.zh: 好的 我要去查看另一个房间

translation.en: I want you on the deck now. It's the only way
translation.zh: 你马上去甲板 她要离开

translation.en: -she can get off this damn ship. -[man] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -那是唯一的路 -遵命 女士

translation.en: [woman] All security personnel should be on full alert.
translation.zh: 所有安保人员保持高度警惕

translation.en: The asset is missing. Multiple intruders. I want a full sweep of the ship.
translation.zh: 资产失踪 多名入侵者 我要彻底搜查这艘船

translation.en: -[Art] Was that Robin I heard? -Yeah, she's in the control room.
translation.zh: -我听到的是罗宾的声音吗？ -对 她在控制室

translation.en: I think she knows where Tracy is.
translation.zh: 我想她知道翠西在哪里

translation.en: All right, we gotta get to the bow.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们得去船首

translation.en: I told her anything goes wrong, meet at the front of the boat.
translation.zh: 我跟她说过要是出问题 就在船头碰面的

translation.en: Let's get you out of here. Come on.
translation.zh: 咱们赶紧离开这里吧 快点

translation.en: How much time we got left?
Less than five, more than zero.
-Still got your pill? -Yeah, I'm saving that one.
translation.zh: -你还有药吗？ -有 那颗我一直留着
迫不得已时的最后手段

translation.en: -All right, we're gonna run. Ready? -[watch beeps]
translation.zh: 好 我们要开始跑了 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Stay with me. Go, go, go!
[Frank] Come on! Your dad's right behind us.
translation.zh: 快点！你爸爸就在我们后面
-罗宾在哪里？ -我以为她和你在一起

translation.en: You see who I have here?
[woman] I want Tracy out here now!
-Give me the pill. -[Art] It's not gonna work on you.

translation.zh: -这颗药必须由我来吃 -不 爸爸

translation.en: -You know what'll happen if you do that. -I will kill her, Arthur, right now,
translation.zh: -你不知道吃了以后会发生什么 -我会杀了她 阿特 当着你的面

translation.en: I love you more than anything in the world, you hear me?
translation.zh: 我爱你胜过一切 听见了吗？

translation.en: I love you, but there's no way we're leaving her behind.
translation.zh: 我爱你 但我们不能丢下她不管

translation.en: [woman] All of you out of the boat, now!

translation.zh: 听着 如果出任何差错

translation.en: you drop this boat down and get out of here, okay?
translation.zh: 你就放下救生艇 离开这里 好吗？

translation.en: I want Tracy out here now!
-Robin, you all right? -Don't talk to her!
translation.zh: -罗宾 你没事吧？ -别跟她说话

translation.en: [Art] Let me tell you something, Robin.
translation.zh: 我告诉你一些事 罗宾
现在你听好了 博士

translation.en: You let her go, I let you live.
translation.zh: 你放她走 我就放你一条生路

translation.en: I told you what was gonna happen, didn't I?
translation.zh: 我告诉过你会发生什么事 是不是？

translation.en: Tracy, do you think you could heal a gunshot wound?
translation.zh: 翠西 你觉得你能治愈枪伤吗？

translation.en: Who dat say they gon' beat dem Saints?
translation.zh: 谁说他们能打败圣徒队的？

translation.en: Man, it went down in the Dome last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚他们在巨蛋体育场一败涂地

translation.en: It was even louder on the streets.
Did y'all hear about the two explosions last night after the game?
translation.zh: 昨晚比赛后你们有没有听到 两起爆炸的响声？

translation.en: The Coast Guard's saying they can't find any sign of the ship,
translation.zh: 海岸警卫队说他们没有发现 任何船只的踪迹

translation.en: and then, NOPD has absolutely nothing to say about it.
translation.zh: 新奥尔良警局对此没有发表任何评论

translation.en: [Frank] Well, first I think I'll have a long talk with my captain
translation.zh: 首先我要跟我的队长长谈一番

translation.en: then maybe find a journalist looking for their next big story.
translation.zh: 然后 也许我会找一个 正在等着报道轰动事件的记者

translation.en: [Art] You blow that whistle, ain't no going back.
translation.zh: 你爆了这个料 就不能回头了

translation.en: Well, let's see these assholes try to hide when everyone knows what they're doing.
translation.zh: 等大家都知道他们的所作所为 我们看看这帮混蛋还怎么隐瞒

translation.en: You think this is really over?
translation.zh: 你觉得这真的结束了吗？

translation.en: Make sure you check the trunk.
There's something great inside you, Robin.
translation.zh: 你的内心有伟大的东西 罗宾

translation.en: Why you got my mama's phone, man?
translation.zh: 为什么你有我妈的手机？

translation.en: [male DJ] Man, I am about to beat on your eardrums with this one.
translation.zh: 各位 接下来的这首歌 一定会让你们感到震撼

translation.en: from brand new MC Robin Reilly, featuring Chika.
translation.zh: 罗宾·莱利的首支单曲 帮唱歌手是奇卡
